## Install

Uses `fp-ts` as a peer dependency.

```bash
yarn add fp-ts ts-simple-spawn
```

or

```bash
npm install fp-ts ts-simple-spawn
```

## Example

```ts
import * as Lib from 'ts-simple-spawn'

// write an example...
```
